original: 回復時間：$Skill_CD(2691)@在武將四周，召喚出12名飛熊軍，攻擊附近的敵人。飛熊軍屬性體力值：$Soldier_HP(1221)@武力值：$Soldier_Str(1221)@
text: Response time:  $Skill_CD(2691)@ Around the generals, 12 flying bear troops are summoned to attack nearby enemies. Flying bear army attribute physical strength value:  $Soldier_HP(1221)@武力值:  $Soldier_Str(1221)@
